body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, this is Benjamin Rivera from AutoSolutions. May I ask who I have the pleasure of speaking with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, I'm Emma Patterson. Nice to meet you, Benjamin.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you too, Emma! Could you please provide me with your contact number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's eight six seven five five three oh nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Emma. And may I have your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for sharing that information, Emma. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling excited about purchasing a new car and have some questions about the data management at your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I appreciate your interest, Emma. Let me address your concerns. Thank you for your time, and feel free to reach out if you need further assistance. Have a great day!
